trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission" /> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission" /> 执行安全操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute> controls the ability of a Web browser control to run in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute> 控制 Web 浏览器控件能够在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序运行。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
trans-unit.target: 允许声明的范围取决于<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>使用。

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通过安全特性声明的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中存储和在运行时访问系统。

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 安全属性仅用于声明性安全。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 对于命令性安全，使用相应的权限类， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 此类不常在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted permission to create a Web browser control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何要求调用代码的内容已创建的 Web 浏览器控件的权限不受限制。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute.Level%2A> property is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionLevel.None>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute.Level%2A>属性是<xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionLevel.None>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此类的成员通常不是使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何定义<xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission" /> corresponding to the security declaration.
trans-unit.target: 与安全声明相对应的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A> method is called by the security system, not by application code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>由安全系统中，不是由应用程序代码调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The security information described by <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute> is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 所描述的安全信息<xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute>特性目标，它是到类的元数据中存储<xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute>应用。

trans-unit.source: The system accesses the information at run time.
trans-unit.target: 系统访问运行时的信息。

trans-unit.source: The system uses the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission> returned by <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A> to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 系统使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermission>返回<xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute.CreatePermission%2A>要转换的属性目标的安全信息存储在元数据中的可序列化形式。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此类的成员通常不是使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current Web browser permission level for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionAttribute" /> 的当前 Web 浏览器权限级别。

trans-unit.source: The state of the current Web browser permission level.
trans-unit.target: 当前 Web 浏览器权限级别的状态。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionLevel.None>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.WebBrowserPermissionLevel.None>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此类的成员通常不是使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has permission to create a Web browser control that runs at a safe level.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何要求调用代码有权创建在安全级别上运行的 Web 浏览器控件。
